definition: animal hide/leather/to reform/to remove/to expel (from office)

sentences.english: One relatively harmless alternative to sun tanning is to use self-tanning lotions.
sentences.chinese: 相对无害的替代办法之一是利用太阳鞣自我鞣洗剂。

sentences.english: One relatively harmless alternative to sun tanning is to use self-tanning lotions.
sentences.chinese: 相对无害的替代办法之一是利用太阳鞣自我鞣洗剂。

sentences.english: If it used with various retanning agents, the fullness of leather was good.
sentences.chinese: 若与多种复鞣材料搭配使用，亦可制得丰满坚实的革。

sentences.english: Use a chamois, soft towels, or a micro-fiber cloth to dry.
sentences.chinese: 使用鞣，干毛巾或者一块微纤维的布来干燥。

sentences.english: The retanning and finishing technology of Jining goat skin soft bag leather was studied .
sentences.chinese: 对济宁路山羊软包袋革复鞣及整饰工艺进行了研究。

sentences.english: In this paper, organic tannages were investigated to replace chrome tannage.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了一种取代铬鞣的有机鞣法。

sentences.english: Ultraviolet light from the sun and tanning beds can cause skin cancer and wrinkling.
sentences.chinese: 紫外线光从太阳和鞣病床可导致皮肤癌和起皱。

sentences.english: The data in this article demonstrate the anti-cancer properties of ellagic acid as well as its mechanism of action.
sentences.chinese: 稳重的数据揭示了鞣花酸的抗癌性质及作用机制。

sentences.english: The reference retanning process of pig garment leather was also given.
sentences.chinese: 文中提出了猪服装革复鞣的参考工艺。

sentences.english: It is different from the mummy also different from the body wax and peat body tanning.
sentences.chinese: 它既不同于木乃伊，又不同于尸腊和泥炭鞣尸。

sentences.english: A retanning fatliquoring agent has been prepared by condensing the oligomer with phospholipid , and applied in chrome retanning and fatiquoring processes.
sentences.chinese: 将该低聚物与磷脂缩合，制备出了一种复鞣加脂剂。

definition: see 蛋白腖|蛋白胨[dan4 bai2 dong4]
gear/brake/sluice/lock (on waterway)/electric switch or circuit breaker
old variant of 閘|闸[zha2]/sluice/lock (on waterway)
ugly and fat/too fat to move
